title: Welcome
text:
Hello, I’m MIStatlE 👋
This is my minimal Quarto website. Math works out of the box:

Inline math: \int_0^1 x^2\,dx = 1/3
Display math:


\mathbb{P}(|S_n - n\mu| \ge t) \le 2\exp\!\left(-\frac{t^2}{2\sigma^2 n}\right).

Use the Posts section for articles and notes. Edit _quarto.yml to customize the navbar and theme1.

title: Starting Over: Building MIStatlE Lab
text:
This is a starter post. You can write math like e^{i\pi}+1=0 and code blocks:
def add(a, b): return a + b
print(add(2, 3))
To publish, just push to main — GitHub Actions will render and deploy to gh-pages.
